sourceMeaningMnemonic: If there is <radical>dirt</radical> in a <radical>crab trap</radical>, it's a lot for the crabs to <kanji>endure</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Imagine a little crab getting stuck in a crab trap with dirt and other crabs. Endure the horror as long as you can, little friend.
readingMnemonic: You decide to make the little crab that <kanji>endure</kanji>d being stuck in a dirty crab trap your pet, and put a <reading>colla</reading>r (<ja>こら</ja>) round its little neck.
readingInfo: Imagine yourself putting a collar around the crab's neck, then adding a leash and taking your crab for a walk around your neighborhood.
